resources.string:
Leave your old phone at home, divert phone call to your day-to-day phone number when busy. 
 
Whenever there is an incoming call, it will: 
1) reject (so that forward to your day-to-day phone number) if the calling number is in the address book (a.k.a. white list) 
2) auto answer the phone call if it is a local spam (not costing a cent) 
3) let it be if it is a non-local spam. 
4) reject (so that forward) if it is an unknown number. 
 
 Every phone call is archived to your email inbox 
 
 Prerequisites: 
 1) you need to turn on debug 
 2) you need to run "adb tcpip 5555" to enable debug over network. 
 3) You need to install the EmailNofitication app and configure the SMTP relay and the email to receive notifications.
